name: Purrfect Date - Visual Novel/Dating Simulator
description: As Cat Island’s newest arrival, it’s not long before you realise something’s seriously amiss, or should we say… amorous! A blend of mystery, intrigue and wickedly black humour, will you discover your Purrfect Date before it’s too late? Remember, curiosity killed the cat...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: ​Intel Celeron N2830 / Intel Core 2 Duo T7300 / Athlon 64 X2 TK-55 or equivilent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 / Nvidia GT 520 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 / AMD FX-6300 / Core i5-4300M Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: ​Intel HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 1 GB available space
